channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM -- Security SiteProtector System

item.title: CVE-2020-4138|2024-09-16T18:39:31.304Z -- ibm -- security%20siteprotector%20system
item.description: IBM SiteProtector Appliance 3.1.1 allows web pages to be stored locally which can be read by another user on the system. IBM X-Force ID: 174049.
